post.title: Hello There
post.description: Hello there! Can you actually hear me ? It's the first post of mine.
post.content: Hey guys, what's up ? Since my blog was shutted down one/two years ago, I couldn't write posts because of different reasons: exams, lessons, so you got it. You can read my old posts here. As always I love Linux, Web Development & English of course. That's why I'll try my best to impress my experience in the posts that I'll be writing. Except technical posts, maybe I also will tell about interesting events from my life, news. So, be ready, soon here you'll get new I hope interesting posts for you. By the way, now I have portfolio website, there are some kinda projects of mine, about me, etc, so check out the link
